content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to Universal Pictures' future plans or goals. However, Universal Pictures has made several public statements about their commitment to diversity and inclusion. For example, Universal's parent company, Comcast, set a goal to achieve 50% diversity in their workforce by 2023. Additionally, Universal has launched several initiatives to promote diversity in its films, including the Universal Writers Program, which aims to identify and develop new and diverse talent in screenwriting, and the Global Talent Development & Inclusion team, which works to increase diversity and inclusivity across all areas of the company.
